content.question: Which of the following can be predicted about his performance as a caretaker based on the concept of stereotype threat?

choices.label: The father will ignore the news reports because they do not apply to him.
The father will experience increased resentment toward childcare.
The father will experience increased anxiety and make mistakes as a caretaker.
The father will develop an insecure attachment with his child.

content.answer: The father will experience increased anxiety and make mistakes as a caretaker.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
